name: Commonwealth ex rel. Nichols, Appellant, v. Lederer
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth ex rel. Nichols v. Lederer

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok and Eagen, JJ.
parties: Commonwealth ex rel. Nichols, Appellant, v. Lederer.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The order of the Superior Court is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Montgomery, reported at 193 Pa. Superior Ct. 482, 165 A. 2d 711 (1960).
Mr. Justice Musmanno dissents.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Arlen Specter, Assistant District Attorney, with him Charles L. Durham and Thomas M. Reed, Assistant District Attorneys, Paul M. Ghalfin, First Assistant District Attorney, and James M. Crumlish, Jr., District Attorney, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth ex rel. Nichols, Appellant, v. Lederer.
Argued April 27, 1961.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok and Eagen, JJ.
Samuel Dash, for appellant.
Arlen Specter, Assistant District Attorney, with him Charles L. Durham and Thomas M. Reed, Assistant District Attorneys, Paul M. Ghalfin, First Assistant District Attorney, and James M. Crumlish, Jr., District Attorney, for appellee.
June 26,1961:
